itemDescription: A dull blade dropped by a missing chef.
This key belongs to a Lady Capulet. Used to open her secret dia- *ahem* journal.
The inscription reads "This diary belongs to Lady Capulet of the Capulet family. Any trespassing eyes will be beheaded."
Stale bread bought by the cook at a cheap price. Don't expect better for dinner.
A mythical and luminous gem that holds powers to unlock a gate of some sort.
A newly bought tool by the groundskeeper. Make sure he doesn't find out you have it.
A gun with a few bullets. Every shot is fatal. You've been warned.
A handheld wrap with carne asada, black beans, brown rice and vegetables.
